name: heterotrophic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of a living thing) getting its food from other plants or animals, or relating to such living things: Carbon dioxide is utilized by heterotrophic organisms. There are high levels of heterotrophic bacteria in the aquarium. See
heterotroph
More examplesFewer examplesIt would seem that the first organisms were heterotrophic.I used to teach that a fungus was heterotrophic. The results of these two experiments might best be explained by a gradual failure of heterotrophic metabolism.
